tool.name: SAGA.ta_morphometry.13
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArraySWR False isArrayLAI False output_data_LST $output_data_LST name SAGA.ta_morphometry.13 DEM $DEM SWR $SWR LAI $LAI LAI_MAX $LAI_MAX Z_REFERENCE $Z_REFERENCE T_REFERENCE $T_REFERENCE T_GRADIENT $T_GRADIENT C_FACTOR $C_FACTOR prefer $prefer response $response outputType_LST $OutputSection_LST.outputType_LST transmissionMode_LST $OutputSection_LST.transmissionMode_LST

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: SWR
param.label: Short Wave Radiation Ratio
param.help: The ratio of daily total short-wave irradiance on sloping sites compared to horizontal sites. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: LAI
param.label: Leaf Area Index
param.help: Leaf Area Index The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: T_REFERENCE
param.label: Temperature
param.help: Temperature at reference station in degree Celsius.

param.name: T_GRADIENT
param.label: Temperature Lapse Rate
param.help: Vertical temperature gradient in degree Celsius per 100 meter.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_LST
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_LST
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Temperature estimation at each grid point as a function of temperature, temperature lapse rate and elevation for a reference station. Further optional input is the Leaf Area Index (LAI) and the short-wave radiation ratio, which relates the irradiance including terrain effects to that calculated for a flat, horizontal plane. See Wilson & Gallant (2000) for more details.
